name: Giratina
author: Hasuno
flavor_text: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.

abilities.name: Distortion Door
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is in your discard pile, you may put it onto your Bench. If you do, put 1 damage counter on 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shadow Impact
attacks.effect: Put 4 damage counters on 1 of your Pokémon.
